segments.text: I see the girl standing next to the boy, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad for her, having to rely on her brother to get her a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even trying to climb up herself, just waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever tried to get the cookies herself, or if she always lets her brother do it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems to be the brave one, taking risks to get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he shares with her, and doesn't just keep all the cookies for himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is still completely unaware of their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being smart, not trying to climb up there herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also think she might be a bit too reliant on her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR
